ART-001.title: How to Clear Browser Cache
ART-001.content:
To clear your browser cache:

**Chrome:**
1. Press Ctrl+Shift+Delete (Cmd+Shift+Delete on Mac)
2. Select 'All time' from the time range
3. Check 'Cached images and files'
4. Click 'Clear data'

**Firefox:**
1. Press Ctrl+Shift+Delete (Cmd+Shift+Delete on Mac)
2. Select 'Everything' from time range
3. Check 'Cache'
4. Click 'Clear Now'

**Safari:**
1. Go to Safari menu > Clear History
2. Select 'All History'
3. Click 'Clear History'

ART-002.title: Password Reset Instructions
ART-002.content:
If you're unable to log in, try resetting your password:

1. Go to the login page
2. Click 'Forgot Password?'
3. Enter your email address
4. Check your email for reset instructions
5. Click the reset link (valid for 24 hours)
6. Create a new strong password

**Password Requirements:**
- At least 8 characters
- One uppercase letter
- One lowercase letter  
- One number
- One special character

If you don't receive the reset email, check your spam folder or contact support.

ART-003.title: API Rate Limits and Error Handling
ART-003.content:
Our API has the following rate limits:

**Standard Plan:** 1,000 requests/hour
**Pro Plan:** 5,000 requests/hour  
**Enterprise Plan:** 50,000 requests/hour

**Common Error Codes:**
- 429: Rate limit exceeded
- 500: Internal server error
- 503: Service temporarily unavailable

**Best Practices:**
- Implement exponential backoff for 5xx errors
- Cache responses when possible
- Use pagination for large datasets
- Monitor your usage in the dashboard

If you're experiencing consistent 500 errors, please contact our engineering team.

ART-004.title: Billing and Refund Policy
ART-004.content:
**Billing Cycle:**
All plans are billed monthly on the date you signed up.

**Refund Policy:**
- Full refund within 30 days of signup
- Partial refunds for downgrades (prorated)
- No refunds for accounts terminated for policy violations

**Common Billing Issues:**
- Duplicate charges: Usually resolved within 24 hours
- Failed payments: Update payment method in settings
- Upgrade/downgrade: Changes take effect immediately

**Contacting Billing:**
For billing questions, include your account email and approximate charge date.
